title:
Investigation of Multiple Resource Theory Design Principles on Robot
  Teleoperation and Workload Management

tables.caption: Adapted NASA-Task Load Index <cit.> Questions
headers: Stress: How stressful the task was
rows: Mental Demand: How taxing the task was on you mentally
Physical Demand: How taxing the task was on you physically
Effort: How much effort you think you applied to complete the task
Frustration: How frustrated you were while completing the task
* Likert items are coded from 1 (Very Low) to 7 (Very High).
